about_the_game:
In The Fur in Me, you play as a young Fur on a journey home who finds out his land has been taken by the evil Furbats. It's up to you to defeat them and save the day! However, you are not without power. With the magic colors at your side, you will run, jump and smash your way through hundreds of enemies and obstacles!

ARE YOU READY FUR YOUR DESTINY?

COLORS EVERYWHERE

In order to defeat your enemies and overcome obstacles, you have to smash them while matching colors. With up to 6 colors, there's a lot of SMATCHING to do!

LOTS OF CHALLENGES

Around 300 challenges to overcome and lots of difficulty levels that can make this journey either a cakewalk (enemies with only one color) or an absolute nightmare (enemies with 6 colors).


A VIBRANT WORLD

Travel through 30 levels, as you explore mountains, caves, forests, beaches and much more, all in glorious 4k visuals.


AN EPIC TALE

A majestic story filled with twists spanning over 1000 years, told through over 100 detailed cartoon images.


A BEAUTIFUL SOUNDTRACK

A diverse and original soundtrack that brings life to the world.

A RESPECT FOR PLAYER'S TIME

Our objective is for you to have the most fun possible. Our efforts to save your time translate in:


  • Autosaves before every challenge.
  • Short respawn time.
  • No cheap deaths.
  • No backtracking.

With cute visuals, a beautiful soundtrack, lots of challenges, lots of difficulties, a respect for player's time and an epic story to uncover, The Fur in Me is a work of love made by gamers for gamers. Grab your controller or keyboard and enjoy the ride!

Oh, and don't forget to add The Fur in Me to your Wishlist, it's the best you can do for us !!! Fur real =P
